During the Wednesday airing of his Comedy Central show , " The Daily Show with Trevor Noah , " the liberal host said that credit should be paid where it 's due when it comes to Trump 's negotiating skills] . " I know our first instinct is to hate , " Noah said of CIA Director Mike Pompeo 's meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , " but if it was n’t for his craziness , North Korea would never have come to the table . " Noah added , " You know that ’s what he did . Trump is like the near - death experience that makes people forget why they were fighting in the first place . That ’s who he is . " The late - night show host went on to laud Trump 's " actual progress " in securing such talks between the U.S. and North Korea . Anything …
